analysis.description:
Reentrancy in QravityTeamTimelock.release (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#219-228):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_amount <= availableAmount(now)) (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#225-227)
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#227)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- releasedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#227-228)

QravityTeamTimelock.release (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#219-228) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol#227)

QCOToken.rescueToken (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_foreignToken.transfer(_to,_foreignToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x3a8a97123bccd826228e5eb4144b48cce169517b.sol)
